## A Review of discarded packages.

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
disc_packages <- read.csv("./data/discpack.csv")
colnames(disc_packages) <- c("Id", "Package", 	"Category", 	"Reason to Discard")
kableExtra::kable(disc_packages, align="lcl") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```
